Articles.Content: Jeb has just returned from his 3rd mission this in-game month, twice to the Mun (different craters), another time to Minmus. He's currently standing in the VAB disturbing the poor engineers by looking between the current 1.25m asparagus lifter and the pile of boosters while grinning in a most disconcerting manner. Bill and Bob are starting to feel like the astronaut complex is home, as they haven't been on a single mission yet. I have a feeling Jeb is waiting for them to get good and settled in before 'requesting their presence' on some crazy interplanetary suicide run. Just so he can be amused on those long transfers.
TBH no one knows where Jeb is, he could be in orbit drinking kethane-infused tea, or in the Astronaut Complex, drinking Kethane-infused tea
My Jeb is tied to a long string of about 10 KAS winches trying to reach gilly's surface from a small pod in orbit (because why not)
My Jeb is in my station orbitingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦..Kerbin and in a few years the Mun and then Kerbin and so on foreverÃ¢â‚¬Â¦..
My Jeb is safely home at KSC. Since he, Bob and Bill were rescued from Mun he has been back to both Mun and Minmus.

safe at KSC for now, he spent the last five years on 3 different missions, he went into orbit around duna and Ike in one of those, orbited around Eve and landed on Gilly on another, then went on to land on Dres. I think he's due for a little vacation

... I think he's due for a little vacation

I heard the beaches of Laythe are pretty nice this time of year.

I heard the beaches of Laythe are pretty nice this time of year.

yeah, sadly i don't send kerbals on another planet if i don't know i can get them back, i'm not super good right now at in-orbit building so something that can get to laythe, land and return is out of my reach... for now...

He... err... It was totally planned for him to establish a permanent research base on the MÃƒÂ¼n! Alone. Without any science instruments except for a thermometer. Without landing legs or an engine. It was totally not actually the case that we just wanted to throw him into space for a few hours in a ship designed for that and only that (with just a little fuel to spare), but then found that there was a good oppurtunity for a MÃƒÂ¼n landing! We would never ever act without planning ever at all! That idea is so wrong that I don't even want to comment on it. No. He's really absolutely supposed to be stranded living on the MÃƒÂ¼n!

Jeb> "Day 412523 on the moon. Temperature: Still the same as yesterday. And the day before. And the day before. And..."

Jeb> "Day 412523 on the moon. Temperature: Still the same as yesterday. And the day before. And the day before. And..."

(12 days later) ok we have enough temperature readings to develop spaceplane parts, we will need you to stay there another few years before we get enough science to save you.
In my game he is smeared across the KSC runway. His spaceplane hit an invisible launch pad(According to F3) when coming in to land, and deconstructed itself 150m above the runway.
Currently, he is working on Minmus base 1 as commander. I hope he takes showers, because he's been with Bill & Bob for over 600 days!
Ded. D-E-D. Unfortunate incident involving parachutes and locked steering. I forgot the "Revert" button again. I'm sure he'll show up to work sooner or later.

Jeb is currently stranded living on Mun after my first manned landing ran out of fuel 50m up touched down perfectly as planned. He is conducting experiments while he waits for the second rescue mission.
Jeb is on the return leg of my 42 year manned ion probe to the outer planets. Yay for ions having 4.2k ISP...
Chilling on his interstellar rocket with bob, they are some trillion billion meters away from the sun.
Bob and Bill stuck him on top of the Christmas tree. They thought the traditional angel or star decoration was a bit too.. dull.

Mine is stuck on the Mun, surrounded by two other "rescue" ships that contain both Bill and Bob.

Glad there is no Food/Air requirement atm
Drinking Pina Colada in a improvised cabana (Mk1 lander can) on a beach at kerbin. Doesn't want to go back, defector
Update! Jeb has become part of the Duna Mining Colony. Well, he was until he fell off the drilling rover...

Mine is on a very eccentric orbit ranging from jool to moho.

What happened was a simple mission to duna, i ran out of fuel some 300 deltaV short from meeting kerbin. The craft had no docking ports and was full of valuable science i didn't want to send over the radio so i built a kind of space tug or rather push, a craft that would meet up with it and push it to kerbin at which point another one of these would catch it. The pushing action worked brilliantly, only problem was it had a crazy amount of velocity when it arrived in kerbin and i couldn't catch it in time so it flew off to its current orbit.. its been there for several years of ingame time now, im planning on rescuing him as soon as i get the atomic rocked unlocked
My Jeb is currently in LKO manning a Duna Explorer waiting for his transfer window... in 220-odd days.
Last time i saw Jeb he was going for a walk on Minmus, when he fell off a mountain, and got his head in the ice. I really dont know if he survived. ut i'm sending a rescue rocket anyway.
I have literally no clue where my Jeb is
He should be dead 10x over but keeps comeing back.....
